price: 27. Markaas Alle ka toobad aqbalo intaas kaddib cidduu doono. Allena waa Denbi dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatūbu al-lahu min baʿdi dhālika ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
